channel.title: TP2006 Rs-Remake Development
channel.description:
[center][/center] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/641/rslogo1.gif/][IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/205/rslogo1.gif[/img][/URL]
Please visit: http://tp2006.co.cc
Youtube Channel For now: http://www.youtube.com/sub2trollthewild Subscribe please.
Latest Updates Fixed some equipment Definitions. Fixed little Weapon accuracy Fixed Ladder System Fixed NPC animations (NPC stretching out bug)
Combat PvP fully Complete PvN fully Complete Perfect max hit Perfect accuracy Every Weapon Special attack Equipment effects Equipment Requirnments Weapon Poisoning
Magic Most modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Weakning Spells Teleblock/binding/freezing Every other spell including Alching/Superheat
Ranged Bows/Arrows Throwing Weapons Crossbows/karils/shortbows can't shoot through walls Ranged Distances (9 steps for long range, 7 Steps for normal)
Prayer All bones Bury-able Every Prayer Working Propely Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
Mining Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations
Smithing All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
Fishing Most fish can be caught Big net fishing Correct item requirements Fishing spots located in most areas Correct animations Moving fishing locations
Cooking. Range cooking Log Cooking Everything else
Woodcutting Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able
Firemaking All logs lightable Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
Agility Gnome, Wilderness, pyramid and brimhaven courses usable Run energy affected(weight + level) Force Movement mask Correct animations
Herblore Correct animations Herb Indentifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Item grinding(pestle use) Poisoning weapons Can pour doses into other doses
Thieving NPC thievery working Can thieve stalls Correct animations used Lose hp when caught (stunned)
Crafting Cutting gems Everything else
Runecrafting(nothing much started atm) Use of the Abyss Rock mining Tendrils chopping Boil burning Eyes distracting Gap crossing Passage Skulled when entering Prayer drained to 0 Dark mage repairing pouches
Fletching All logs can be fletched (shafts if normal log)Option interface for short and long bow Can string bows Bow stringing Everything else
Slayer All slayer masters Few monsters added every task Burthope tasks canafis tasks Edgeville tasks Lost city tasks Shilo village tasks Tips on killing monsters Slayer shops All slayer masters working All equipment working Item that finishes off some monsters Equipment that are required to fight some monsters
Slayer gem working
Minigames Duel arena Castle wars Fight caves fight pits Barrows pest control
Music Get music packets All areas have music
Sound Sounds in very little areas
Quests Tutorial island(needs work) Black Knights Fortress Lost City Cook's Assistant ETC
Now for pictures
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/338/dialoguep.png/][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/8653/dialoguep.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/19/firemakingd.png/][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1544/firemakingd.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/546/lolnku.png/][IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/9422/lolnku.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/534/lol.tif/][IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/2026/lol.tif[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/843/92571903.tif/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/7958/92571903.tif[/img][/URL]
MORE COMING SOON.
